name: Totem Pole
desc: Monumental carvings, a type of Northwest Coast art, consisting of poles, posts or pillars, carved with symbols or figures.

name: Hike
desc: A long, vigorous walk or jog, usually on trails or footpaths in the mountains.

name: Cloudy
desc: Visible masses of condensed droplets or frozen crystals suspended in the atmosphere.

name: Mountains
desc: Large landforms that rise above the surrounding land in a limited area, usually in the form of peaks.

name: Dog
desc: A domesticated carnivore of the family Canidae. Man's best friend.

name: Sunset
desc: The daily disappearance of the Sun below the horizon due to Earth's rotation.

name: Sunrise
desc: The moment when the upper limb of the Sun appears on the horizon in the morning.

name: Beach
desc: A landform alongside a body of water which consists of loose particles.

name: Ocean
desc: A body of water that composes much of a planet's hydrosphere.
